headline: Uber Inks Customer-Friendly Deal With Best Buy: Sign of More Growth?
summary: UBER teams with Best Buy to bring electronics delivery to more than 800 stores via Uber Eats, boosting its diversification-related approach.

headline: Best Buy revenue grows despite ‘tariff situation’
summary: The electronics retailer reported improved comps, though the impact of a changing trade environment continues to loom over earnings performance.

headline: Best Buy: Multiple Drivers To Support Earnings Growth
summary: BBY's strong 2Q25 results and accelerating comp sales signal a durable top-line recovery and de-risk the 2H25 outlook.

raw.headline: Best Buy: Multiple Drivers To Support Earnings Growth

headline: U.S. holiday spending set for steepest drop since pandemic, PwC survey shows
summary: PwC, which polled about 4,000 U.S. consumers between June and July, said shoppers on average plan to spend about $1,552 per person, down 5.3% from last year.  The last comparable decline was in 2020, when average spend fell 7.6% to $1,187.
